name: Global Boveda
tag_list: personal-online-storage, documents, information, backup-files, data-forms, pre-made-forms, online, important, sensitive, organized, store, deposit-box, secure, safe, encrypted, management-file-storage, cloud-storage, online-file-storage, online-storage, o
overview:
Global Boveda is a Persoal Online Library that stores, secures and helps organize users crucial and sentimental documentation.

To paint a picture in your mind it would be like putting your information in a filing cabinet that is inside a vault.

Users are able to store anything document related, for example Wills and Trusts, to Medical information, to the Cards in their Wallet. The online safety deposit box gives the user a specfic way to organize, back-up, and conveniently access their information whenever and wherever.

How users can organize thier information is by using the pre-mades forms offered. These forms are more like Guidleines to help direct the user in the right direction on what to store. Along with the forms, users are able to upload images of the orginial document and can leave notes. An example would be leaving a note of where the physical location of the document is.

What Global Boveda is not is a cloud service or online backup service for your computer.
